info.name: Budget Service API Documentation
info.description: The Budget service exposes budget and fiscal year data. Partners and clients may use the service endpoints to read and alter fiscal year, budget, budget adjustment, and budget matching configuration. Summary and detailed balance amounts are also available to read, but may not be altered via the API.
